TEST_NAME: HTML should be correctly configured in IG Cols
QUERY_CLOB:
select case when eba_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.link_text) = 'N'
            then 'N'
            when eba_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.heading) = 'N'
            then 'N'
            when aapic.item_type = 'NATIVE_HTML_EXPRESSION'
            then eba_stds_parser.valid_html_yn(aapic.attribute_01) 
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,                          
       aapic.application_id, 
       aapic.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       aapic.last_updated_by,
       aapic.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML : `%3`', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id,
        p3 => aapic.attribute_01) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Interactive Grid Column `%0` (app %1, page %2) has malformed HTML', 
        p0 => aapic.heading, 
        p1 => aapic.application_id,
        p2 => aapic.page_id) issue_title,
       aapic.column_id component_id,
       aapic.parent_column_id parent_component_id,
       aapic.heading,
       aapic.label,
       aapic.item_type,
       aapic.name,
       aapic.attribute_01,
			 aapic.workspace
from apex_appl_page_ig_columns aapic
inner join apex_application_pages aap on aap.page_id = aapic.page_id and aap.application_id = aapic.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo1 on aabo1.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo1.application_id = aap.application_id
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on aabo2.build_option_name = aapic.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aapic.application_id
where aapic.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo1.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
EXPLANATION: HTML is being checked for matching opening and closing tags
